physical_examinations.vital_signs: Head circumference: 35.5 cm, Height: 56 cm (<97% of boys at the same age), Intraocular pressure: 16 mmHg (right eye), 12 mmHg (left eye)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No facial dysmorphia detected, bilateral microcornea, microphthalmos, congenital membranous cataracts, persistent pupillary membranes, P2 latency of visual evoked potential delayed in both eyes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At three-month follow-up, severe posterior capsular opacification noticed in the right eye, a second surgery prescribed to remove opacities.
